eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
-{1\over2} \partial_i^2K+\partial_u\partial^i A_i
+{1\over 4} F_{ij} F^{ij}-
{1\over 4} H_{ij} H^{ij}
+2\partial^2_u \phi&=&0
\cr
\partial^iF_{ij}=0 \  ,
~~~~~~~~~~~~\partial^i H_{ij}&=&0~,
\

\begin{eqnarray}
&&\sum_{k=1}^d (-1)^k M_{ik} m_{1k} = 0 \;\;\;\;\;\;i\neq 1\nonumber\\
\Rightarrow && (-1)^1 M_{i1}m_{11} + (-1)^i M_{ii}m_{1i} = - \sum_{k\neq i,k\neq 1} (-1)^k
M_{ik} m_{1k}\;\;.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
U^+(\theta_1, \theta_2) x U(\theta_1, \theta_2)&=&x+\theta_2 p_y
\cr
U^+(\theta_1, \theta_2) y U(\theta_1, \theta_2)&=&y+\theta_2 p_x~.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
(\ref{bbc})&=&-i \theta_2 d\theta_1  <n_1, n_2|(xp_x+p_y y) |n_1, n_2>
\cr
&=&
{1\over2} \theta_2 d\theta_1 <n_1, n_2|([\aa_1, \aa_1^+]- [\aa_2, \aa_2^+])|n_1, n_2>=0~.
\

M_{ik} m_{1k}\;\;.
